comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Valentine Kachouba was a dancer of the Ballett Russe; another photo shows her in the same dress together with Serge Diaghileff on the French liner Lafayette, which arrived on January 11, 1916 in New York: New-York tribune., January 12, 1916, Page 9 (according to this, V. Kachouba is the woman at left, not at right). Another photo of V. Kachouba in The sun., January 16, 1916, FIFTH SECTION LITHOGRAVURE SUPPLEMENT, Image 55 Alexandra Wassilewska (or Wasilewska) was another dancer of the Ballett Russe, see catalogue.bnf.fr/servlet/autorite?ID=15742148&idNoeud...

comment.author: 33593953@N02
comment._content: Thanks for the information and links. We can add some information when we next update the description.
